Answer: Automation has nothing to do with the improvement of ‘innovation’. On the flip side, of course innovation can improve automation. Innovation is a creative process, Thinking up new ways of doing older things, or creating new things themselves. Automation is the process of standardizing and improving the flow of production. The idea that perhaps AI can increase innovation is probably not valid. AI may be a possible source of integrating existing ideas, but if you mean radical NEW concepts that may be some while yet. We don’t know if it’s possible to automate true creativity.
